column4: I only hear sound out of one side when in Sound Preferences and testing ALSA but not with OSS, did I break something?
try turning the volume down completely in ALSA mixer then back up
: Sorry that fix is for OSS, nvm
not that I know of, as ALSA doesn't work for me.
The odd thing is, is that it works -sometimes-.
: ALSA works for me before the initial kernel update, but after it switches to OSS, and ALSA doesn't work, which is a bummer, since thats the only way I can get sound recording working
Fixed it! It was something in my .asoundrc file that was screwing it up.
Why not just select ALSA rather than OSS?
There isn't an entry, it just gets removed after I update the kernel after initial install
Doesn't matter, I've been trying to fix it for 4 months
So you've tried installing ALSA manually already?
